# Run-all quarto documents in this folder 

Make sure you are in the right project path

```{r}
project_path <-"~/projects/project_group11/"
```

```{r}
getwd()
```

```{r}
# Specify the directories
current_dir <- "R/"
output_dir <- "results/"



# List all .qmd files in the R folder, excluding this file
qmd_files <- list.files(path = current_dir, pattern = "\\.qmd$", full.names = TRUE)
qmd_files <- qmd_files[qmd_files != "run-all.qmd"]

# Print the files being rendered
cat("Rendering the following .qmd files to:", output_dir, "\n")
print(qmd_files)

# Render each .qmd file into the output directory
lapply(qmd_files, function(file) {
  quarto_render(
    input = file,
    output_options = list(output_dir = output_dir)
  )
})
```
